website_summaries.verdict: The ideal value set for creating at-home beach waves. Shampoo and conditioner duo works well for straight and wavy hair.
pros: In addition to creating texture, the Sea shampoo and conditioner also add volume
Doesn’t dry out hair like other sea salt texturizing products
cons: Will dry out hair if used too often

customer_reviews.title: Not real products
customer_reviews.text: Items came as described but the product must not be original. Unfortunately I am stylist who uses these products a lot and can tell the difference. This shampoo left my thin hair very flat and dull. Normally the Verb Sea leaves it feeling thicker and it will hold curl a lot better. I am not pleased with this item as I live overseas and cannot ship it back easily. I am hours from a courier. Will not use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not Verb’s best products
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo/conditioner set isn’t as nice as their volume or hydration sets. This sea salt one is a tad drying so I’ll save it for the summer. I do like the texture it gives my hair, but I won’t buy this one again. I’ll go back to the other two I mentioned. Also, the comb that came with this box set is really cheap plastic and some of the teeth were snapped off when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I've never been so excited about hair products before. I love this shampoo/conditioner so much that I find myself washing my hair more often than I used to, not because I need to, but because I love the scent. And I am super picky about scents - really, I hate them. But these smell so mild and clean and delightful! Also makes my hair feel and look great - definitely adds volume to my thin wavy hair. Like others have said, a small amount goes a long way. I'm happy I've finally found a shampoo and conditioner worth the money that I hope to use for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre shampoo
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, there are plenty of other products that I prefer. Not sure that this really delivered the performance that was promised or was expected. I do like the Verb Sea Spray though.
customer_reviews.author: Lee C.

customer_reviews.title: but my main objective was to purchase the shampoo and conditioner for the great price. I originally tried a sample at sephora ...
customer_reviews.text: My package didn't come with the comb, but my main objective was to purchase the shampoo and conditioner for the great price. I originally tried a sample at sephora and fell in love, this set being no different. I've tried multiple salon quality brands from pureology, milkshake, it's a ten, moroccanoil, etc. This leaves me hair soft and shiny with or without blow drying. My hair is easier to manage, less frizzy, and way more hydrated. Its easier to comb through when towel dried or wet. I'll definitely be purchasing this set again!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Whightsel

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the box was completely destroyed, the shampoo and conditioner were not even in the box, they were free inside the envelope. The conditioner exploded out of the top as well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Ghost Shampoo and Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in how these worked on my hair, left it frizzy and the shampoo is so thin and has a very high what seems to be alcohol content in it. The conditioner is too greasy, have to wash out immediately. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayOrca

customer_reviews.title: This set is really great. I only need a teaspoon of shampoo for ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is really great. I only need a teaspoon of shampoo for my hair instead of tablespoon. I love the conditioner make my hair super soft. I can go a couple days without conditioning it. I'm happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is naturally stick straight and pretty lifeless (long, fine, color treated, and cut with layers). This photo was taken after using Verb Sea Shampoo and Conditioner one time. I didn’t put any product in it or style in any way. I towel dried it and then let it air dry. It’s still soft, has more body, and smells great. Absolutely recommend if you want beach hair without the straw-feel that comes with most sea salt styling sprays!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love this product but i found it made my hair dry! Smell good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Verb Shampoo and Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave me this for Christmas. I like the way it makes my hair feel. It doesn’t leave a residue nor a oily look. I go 2/3 days before washing my hair. The conditioner doesn’t feel heavy or thick on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: Fine for less thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Lovely smell. Conditioner is thin, and doesn’t help my very thick hair. Fine for less thick hair
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Davies

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with a comb
customer_reviews.text: My package also did not come with a comb. What a bummer as it said it would come with one
customer_reviews.author: austin delamare

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These products are great for my hair, it gives a lift to my hair and my wigs.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Fay

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant smell. Rinse cleanly. Nice lather with the shampoo. I have short hair so I really can't comment on how they work on long hair. But they work fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Miller

customer_reviews.title: This did not come with a canvas pouch as indicated
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if it came with the canvas pouch as indicated! It did not! The shampoo and conditioner are wonderful, but the missing pouch is a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: M Malady

customer_reviews.title: Volume - shine - waves
customer_reviews.text: Received a sample of this set and saw an immediate difference in my curlyish hair. Makes my fine hair full and shiny. Pleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: gingerky

customer_reviews.title: Opened/Leaking Bottles of Product
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser gave me a sample of this product and I loved it!! It is a great shampoo and conditioner, that’s makes my hair so soft. I am very disappointed in the fact that when I opened the gift bag, that the conditioner was open and almost half of it was in the bag. Wasted product and wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hated this product! My hair was a mess! Tangled and dry. I never have problems combing my wet hair, but definitely did when I used this.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Struthers

customer_reviews.title: Only haircare that doesn’t weigh my hair down!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shampoo! Does not weigh my hair down and has a very subtle scent. I wish sent was stronger but I know they want to keep ingredients safe and not use harsh perfumes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Damages hair and leaves it hard
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and Cindy is horrible. It leaves your hair feeling like hay and super hard to manage. Definitely never using this one again.
customer_reviews.author: yami

customer_reviews.title: I love how lightweight this formula is
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight this formula is, it adds volume and texture to my hair without weighing it down. I will definitely be buying again! - Anne Mason
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Did not come in the box with the comb as ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in the box with the comb as listed. Instead arrived in a bag with just the shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: chris davis

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Not good for regular use, just weekly cleansing. Doesn’t clean my hair (thin/wavy) and left my scalp super dry, so it would then over produce oil and my hair would end up very greasy looking in less than 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sutton

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has very fine hair, and this shampoo and conditioner give her volume and body to her hair. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Olga Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how this shampoo/conditioner leaves my hair shiney and not weighted down like most do!
customer_reviews.author: susan kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Came leaking and without the box or the comb
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t come as described, not in a box, not with a comb and it was leaking. I didn’t use it, but I do not recommend because it came leaking, missing the comb and not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Tarran

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo conditioner set at a good price, plus the products are cruelty-free. Leaves hair soft, with touchable texture.
customer_reviews.author: Leah LoSchiavo

customer_reviews.title: Beach texture 👍
customer_reviews.text: Feels really dry when shampooing but the condition softens it up perfectly. It works to give my hair grit and texture to get that beach style I’m after.
customer_reviews.author: andy de la garza

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described
customer_reviews.text: Product does not meet description (boxed shampoo and conditioner with comb). Product arrived in a plastic bag, leaking, and without the comb. Not happy and will not order from again!
customer_reviews.author: Kisha P.

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist recommended this and now I won’t use anything else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product exploded in mail
customer_reviews.text: Product has exploded and half of conditioner was gone. Who do I contact for a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Klecker

customer_reviews.title: Missing Comb
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo and conditioner came in a ziplock bag, comb not included. I used this morning, styled with Bumble and Bumble Don’t Blow it, let air dry. Result was great. My hair is soft with a nice beachy texture. Smells good. Overall, for the price I am satisfied. But not pleased the comb didn’t come with as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Baboechler

customer_reviews.title: ... package I received was a different gift set (looks like it originally included ghost oil
customer_reviews.text: The package I received was a different gift set (looks like it originally included ghost oil, then it was removed) and there was no wide tooth comb. So beware you may not receive what you purchase. Mine most definitely was missing the comb, which was one of the only reasons I chose this particular set!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This had been suggested to me from my cosmotolgist friend ...
customer_reviews.text: This had been suggested to me from my cosmotolgist friend. My other brand was washing my color out. I have been extremely impressed with this set. My hair is definitely loosing less color and my hair is soft after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholette

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've only been able to use this particular product once but have used several Verb products. This one has a nice smell and gives good body for curly hair. It's not an end all be all, but it did help keep my hair in better control with less product use.
customer_reviews.author: brown30

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Full of Body
customer_reviews.text: Received this as gift. Loved it so much, I sent it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Gives beachy texture. But leaves hair slightly dry. ...
customer_reviews.text: Gives beachy texture. But leaves hair slightly dry. But most products that give beachy waves leave hair feeling a little dry.
customer_reviews.author: SingingMom
